When i was 4 or 5 I went to KK Hospital for a surgery on my head. During recover period i revived a toy from Ronald McDonald (i think he came) and i played with it everyday at the hospital. It is a red box with a yellow lid and a red lock with a toy inside. I gave the toy inside to my godmum's son but i still have the box.   

Thanks McDonald for making me happy :) when i was in hospital

6.post_text:
Help us raise S$50,000* for the Ronald McDonald House Charities® (RMHC) Singapore! Till this Sunday, 15 November, McDonald’s Singapore will be donating S$1 from every purchase of Strawberry Sundaes to bring love, hope and courage to children and families supported by RMHC® Singapore. Take a photo with your Strawberry Sundae and spread the message of #lovehopecourage and tell your friends about #mchappydaysg! :)
(Photo Credit: https://instagram.com/oonshuan/)

*Donations will be collected only from 1 to 15 November 2015. Donations to RMHC® Singapore will be capped at S$50,000, thereafter Strawberry Sundae purchases will not include S$1 donation.

Saw this heading "Who cares? Well, we think you do! " and i have a mixture of feelings.

saw this news in yahoo SG news earlier - https://sg.news.yahoo.com/another-worm-has-been-found-in-a-mcdonald-s-meal-034341234.html
Another OMG from me. More n more disappointed on the food quality since some time back. Vegetables given is so little and most  times, it is like one small curled up brown leaf. I have since always remove the vege from the burger. And yes, i do agree with some eaters stated on this FB here on the cheese "quality" and "quantity". There are times i only get to eat one-mouth cheese only.  Sundae seems to be half filled also. Very Sad and disappointed. 
Usually i ordered corn with the burger meal set. Everytime i need to tell the counter crew that please put my butter together with the cold drink instead, cos if they put it together with the burger, the butter will melt and once i reach home or office, the butter become "liquid". There was twice that this counter crew who packed the stuff for me "scolded" me, saying is still butter even is been "liquified". What an attitude this is. I am really pissed off by this attitude and service.

21.post_text:
Congratulations to our 50 winners for the McDonald’s Chill and Win contest!

Each winner will get a pair of tickets to Universal Studios Singapore’s Halloween Horror Nights™ 5 at Resorts World Sentosa upon completion of redemption instructions in our email correspondence.

In order to provide each winner the said redemption instructions, kindly email us at contest@sg.mcd.com by 23 Oct 2015 (Fri) with the following details:
1. Your winning entry and Full name (per NRIC)
2. NRIC No.
3. Contact Number

*Please note that the above details are required to issue you the email and tickets for winners and will not be used for any other purposes.

Enjoy our selected Chill beverages at 50 cents off! Simply head down to our stores and ask for your Chill coupon now! While Stocks Last. Limited Time Only. Terms and Conditions apply.

Terms & Conditions: Offer only applicable to a choice of ala-carte Ribena Chill, Mango Peach Chill, Iced Milk Coffee or Iced Black Coffee on your next purchase. Offer is valid only till 14 Oct 2015 at McDonald’s® main restaurants, while stocks last. Coupon cannot be used with other discounts, offers, promotions or vouchers. Not valid via McDonald’s self-ordering kiosks, drive-throughs, dessert kiosks, McDelivery® and McCafe®, or at Gardens by the Bay, iFly Singapore, Lido, Resorts World Sentosa, Nanyang Poly, NTU, NUS, Singapore Poly and Temasek Poly.
